title: Verify endorsement removal is complete
description: Run grep -ri endorsement src/ to verify no references remain. Run cd src/backend && python -c "from app.main import app" to verify backend starts. Run cd src/frontend && npx tsc --noEmit to verify frontend compiles. Run cd src/backend && python -m pytest to verify backend tests. Run cd src/frontend && npx vitest run to verify frontend tests. Report all results.
acceptance_criteria:
- grep -ri endorsement src/ returns no results
- Backend app imports successfully
- Frontend compiles without errors
- All backend tests pass
- All frontend tests pass
